submission:
class Solution:
    def waysToReachStair(self, k: int) -> int:
        if k == 0: return 2
        if k == 1: return 4
        c = 0
        i = 1
        j = 0
        ans = 0
        while True:
            i = i + 2**j
            j += 1
            c += 1
            if i >= k:
                ex = i - k
                if ex > c: break
                # print(c, ex)
                ans += comb(c, ex)
        # print(ans)
        # print(c, ex, comb(c, ex))
        k += 1
        c = 0
        i = 1
        j = 0
        while i < k:
            i = i + 2**j
            j += 1
            c += 1
        ex = i - k
        ans += comb(c, ex)
        # print(ans)
        return ans
